body_html:
Hmm, I wonder if you could use the spatial transformer code to achieve this.
E.g. generate a sampling grid [0, height] x [0, width], apply your transformation (via batch_matmul) and then collect them exactly as in the spatial_transformer code.

body:
Hmm, I wonder if you could use the spatial transformer code to achieve this.
E.g. generate a sampling grid [0, height] x [0, width], apply your transformation (via batch_matmul) and then collect them exactly as in the spatial_transformer code.
